name: DEWALT Right Angle Drill Adapter - Tighter Access Attachment
description: Increase the productivity and versatility of your existing drill with the DEWALT DWARA50 Right Angle Drill Adapter. Just tighten this adapter in your chuck and you instantly have access to tight and hard to reach spaces. For use with both corded and cordless drills.Tighter access with your current drill/driver2X longer life than the competitionAccepts any 1/4 in. hex shank accessoryFor use with most drill
